title: ECP to hear petition on alleged rigging in PB-45 re-polling on Friday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 09 (APP):The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) has scheduled a hearing for Friday on a petition filed by JUI-F candidate Mir Usman Pirkani, concerning alleged rigging in 15 polling stations of PB-45 during the recent re-polling.
The petition, submitted through senior lawyer and Senator Kamran Murtaza, accuses officials of altering the results of the re-polling in the constituency.
The ECP will examine the claims and assess the validity of the rigging allegations at 15 polling stations during the hearing.
